GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

GetTextPr.name: GetTextPr
GetTextPr.description: Get the text properties of the current run.

ClearContent.name: ClearContent
ClearContent.description: Remove all content from the current run.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Add some text to this run.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text which will be added to the current run.

AddPageBreak.name: AddPageBreak
AddPageBreak.description: Add a page break and start the next element from a new page.

AddLineBreak.name: AddLineBreak
AddLineBreak.description: Add a line break to the current run position and start the next element from a new line.

AddColumnBreak.name: AddColumnBreak
AddColumnBreak.description: Add a column break to the current run position and start the next element from a new column.

AddTabStop.name: AddTabStop
AddTabStop.description: Add a tab stop to the current run.

AddDrawing.name: AddDrawing
AddDrawing.description: Add an object (image, shape or chart) to the current text run.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current run.

SetStyle.name: SetStyle
SetStyle.description: The text style base method.<note>This method is not used by itself, as it only forms the basis for the ApiRun.SetStyle method which setsthe selected or created style for the text.</note>

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The style which must be applied to the text character.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Set the bold property to the text character.

params.name: isBold
params.description: Specifies that the contents of this run are displayed bold.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Set the italic property to the text character.

params.name: isItalic
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed italicized.

SetStrikeout.name: SetStrikeout
SetStrikeout.description: Specify that the contents of this run are displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the line.

params.name: isStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed struck through.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Specify that the contents of this run are displayed along with a line appearing directly below the character(less than all the spacing above and below the characters on the line).

params.name: isUnderline
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed underlined.

SetFontFamily.name: SetFontFamily
SetFontFamily.description: Set all 4 font slots with the specified font family.

params.name: sFontFamily
params.description: The font family or families used for the current text run.

SetFontSize.name: SetFontSize
SetFontSize.description: Set the font size for the characters of the current text run.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The text size value measured in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetColor.name: SetColor
SetColor.description: Set the text color for the current text run in the RGB format.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: If this parameter is set to "true", then r,g,b parameters will be ignored.

SetVertAlign.name: SetVertAlign
SetVertAlign.description: Specify the alignment which will be applied to the contents of this run in relation to the default appearance of the run text: * "baseline" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned by the default text baseline. * "subscript" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned below the default text baseline. * "superscript" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned above the default text baseline.

params.name: sType
params.description: The vertical alignment type applied to the text contents.

SetHighlight.name: SetHighlight
SetHighlight.description: Specify a highlighting color in the RGB format which is applied as a background for the contents of the current run.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isNone
params.description: If this parameter is set to "true", then r,g,b parameters will be ignored.

SetSpacing.name: SetSpacing
SetSpacing.description: Set text spacing measured in twentieths of a point.

params.name: nSpacing
params.description: The value of the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetDoubleStrikeout.name: SetDoubleStrikeout
SetDoubleStrikeout.description: Specify that the contents of this run is displayed with two horizontal lines through each character displayed on the line.

params.name: isDoubleStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed double struck through.

SetCaps.name: SetCaps
SetCaps.description: Specify that any lowercase characters in this text run are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents.

params.name: isCaps
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed capitalized.

SetSmallCaps.name: SetSmallCaps
SetSmallCaps.description: Specify that all small letter characters in this text run are formatted for display only as their capitalletter character equivalents in a font size two points smaller than the actual font size specified for this text.

params.name: isSmallCaps
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed capitalized two points smaller.

SetPosition.name: SetPosition
SetPosition.description: Specify the amount by which text is raised or lowered for this run in relation to the defaultbaseline of the surrounding non-positioned text.

params.name: nPosition
params.description: Specifies a positive (raised text) or negative (lowered text)measurement in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetLanguage.name: SetLanguage
SetLanguage.description: Specify the languages which will be used to check spelling and grammar (if requested) when processingthe contents of this text run.

params.name: sLangId
params.description: The possible value for this parameter is a language identifier as defined byRFC 4646/BCP 47. Example: "en-CA".

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specify the shading applied to the contents of the current text run.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type applied to the contents of the current text run.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetFill.name: SetFill
SetFill.description: Set the text color for the current text run.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the text color.

description: Class representing a small text block calling 'run'.
